item.title: 014 - Revolutionary Hot Sauce
item.description:
I sat down with Tim from Revolutionary Hot Sauce to talk about his craft hot sauce journey and some seriously unique flavors. We cover Hot Java (with coffee and cherry bomb peppers), the Ukrainian-inspired Adjika with green apple, the tropical Sweet Wave, and the ghost pepper-heavy Phantasm.


If you're into small-batch sauces, bold ingredients, and spicy creativity, this one’s for you.

item.title: 013 - Bean's Hot Sauce Co
item.description:
In this episode, I sit down with David, the founder of Bean's Hot Sauce Co, to talk about his journey from startup dreams to building a hot sauce brand with serious flavor and purpose. We dive into two of his standout sauces:

🌶️ Wacky Tabascy – a wild twist on a verde tabasco🫐 Azul de Fuego – a bold blueberry hot sauce with a surprising kick revealed during our chat

David shares what keeps him going, how the company evolved, and what it's like crafting sauces that break the mold.

🔥 For the rest of May, $2 from every bottle sold goes to support Leukemia Texas.

Watch, taste along, and support a great cause.

👇 Hit subscribe for more hot sauce interviews and flavor-packed episodes!

item.title: 012 - Long Island Pepper Company
item.description:
In this episode of Fire & Flavor, I sit down with Mike from Long Island Pepper Company to talk about how his small-batch hot sauce business got started, his passion for gardening, and what it’s like to grow a spicy brand from the ground up. 🌶️🌱

Mike shares the stories behind five incredible fruit-forward sauces:🫐 Blueberry Carolina Reaper🍍 Pineapple Mango Habanero🥭 Mango Ghost🍈 Papaya Carolina Reaper🐉 Dragon's Blood

Each one balances fresh, fruity flavor with a solid kick of heat. Mike was super chill to talk to, and this lineup is not one to miss if you love a flavorful burn.

item.title: 011 - Volcanic Ash Hot Sauce
item.description:
In this episode of Fire & Flavor, I sit down with Maki and Garth, the creators of Volcanic Ash Hot Sauce, a bold small-batch brand built around one seriously unforgettable sauce. After seven years of experimenting and refining, they landed on “The OG,” a deep, savory blend of caramelized garlic, onions, habaneros, and smoky heat that delivers something truly unique. 🌋🌶️


We dive into their flavor philosophy, the story behind the brand name, and how they stay true to their craft with every small-batch release. Whether you're a hot sauce connoisseur or just discovering your heat tolerance, this episode captures what it means to truly obsess over flavor.


💬 Topics Covered:

  • How Maki and Garth created “The OG”

  • The seven-year sauce development journey

  • Staying small-batch and ingredient-focused

  • Building a hot sauce brand with heart

  • Real stories from fans and foodies


🔥 Grab your bottle or learn more at: volcanicashhotsauce.com

item.title: 009 (2.0) - Newks Hot Sauce
item.description:
In this episode of Fire & Flavor, I sit down once again with Jake from Newks Hot Sauce, a Portland, Oregon-based craft hot sauce company. After running into technical issues during our first interview, we reconnected to dive even deeper into his journey of building a hot sauce brand, the challenges of growing in a competitive industry, and the creative process behind five of his standout sauces:


🌶️ Grillo’s Pickles Hot Sauce
🍫 “Chocolate,” a rich blend featuring blackberries, raisins, chocolate habaneros, and chocolate reapers
🍌 Banana and Carolina Reaper Hot Sauce
🔥 Blazin’ Raisin, a hotter twist on “Chocolate”
🌵 Smokey Chipotle


We also talk about pairing these bold flavors with real food and how Newks continues to push the boundaries of what hot sauce can be.


If you are into small-batch hot sauce, unique flavor ideas, and behind-the-scenes stories from passionate makers, this is an episode you will not want to miss.

Web 🌐: https://newkssauces.com

item.title: 010 - Stanky Sauce
item.description:
In this exclusive interview, I sit down with Eddie and Eric, the founders of Stanky Sauce, a bold and creative hot sauce company out of Orlando, Florida. We dive into how the brand got started, their mission to "feed adventure" through flavor, and the journey of turning a spicy passion into a thriving small business.Along the way, we taste five of their standout sauces: Pineapple Habanero Ghost, Garlic Datil, Honey Mango Habanero, Sweet Jalapeno Reaper, and Florida Sunshine BBQ, and explore the ingredients, inspiration, and customer reactions behind each one!

Whether you're a hot sauce fanatic, foodie, or entrepreneur, this conversation is packed with flavor, insight, and heat.

item.title: 008 - Horrifying Hot Sauce
item.description: Join me for a conversation with Ryan from Horrifying Hot Sauce, where we delve into a brand dedicated to crafting complex flavors using unique ingredients, rare chilis, and time‑honored fermentation techniques. Fueled by a passion for horror movies, Ryan not only brings the heat to his sauces but also channels his creativity into making movies, showcasing his work at and spending time at horror movie festivals and beyond.

item.title: 006 - Naked Hot Sauces
item.description:
In this spicy interview, I sit down with Kevin from Naked Hot Sauces out of Newmarket, NH to talk all things hot sauce!


I put my taste buds to the test with three fiery flavors:

🌶️ Down the Hatch – A smooth start with a kick!

🔥 The One – Turning up the heat!

💀 Reaper Madness – Pure, blistering insanity!


Each sauce brings its own unique flavor and increasing intensity, so watch or listen as I sweat, react, and maybe even regret my choices! 😵‍💨🔥

item.title: 001 - Introduction to Fire & Flavor
item.description: Episode 001Welcome to Fire & Flavor, where I, Matt, delve into the passion behind small-batch hot sauces. In this debut episode, I reveal how weekly wing nights ignited my love for spice, how growing chilis at home deepened my appreciation for heat, and why starting my own sauce line wasn’t easy. Now, through interviews with artisan makers, we’ll explore their histories, flagship sauces, and favorite pairings. Join me to celebrate the community, flavors, and fiery enthusiasm that fuel every bottle. Each story highlights the dedication that goes into crafting every bottle of spicy goodness! Enjoy!
